entities.name: contentment
entities.description: Contentment is described as an emotion that stole over Harry. It is mentioned in the context of his interaction with Ron.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is introduced as a person who grins lazily back at Harry. He is mentioned alongside Harry in the context of their interaction with Slughorn.

entities.name: slughorn
entities.description: Slughorn is described as a professor whose massive outline is quivering through the many shimmering vapours. He is introduced as someone who gives instructions to his students.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as a student who raises his hand and asks for help from Slughorn. He is mentioned alongside Ron in the context of their interaction with Slughorn.

entities.name: professor mcgonagall
entities.description: Professor McGonagall is mentioned as someone who did mention something to Harry and Ron about not worrying. She is introduced as a professor who has some authority in the context of the story.

entities.name: flourish and blotts
entities.description: Flourish and Blotts is mentioned as a bookstore where Harry and Ron can buy books. It is introduced as a place that sells books.

entities.name: n.e.w.t.
entities.description: N.E.W.T. is described as an exam that Harry and Ron are taking. It is mentioned in the context of their interaction with Slughorn.

entities.name: advanced potion-making
entities.description: Advanced Potion-Making is mentioned as a book that students need to have for the N.E.W.T. exam. It is introduced as a required textbook.

relationships.description: Slughorn helps Harry by lending him scales and old books, and allowing him to use ingredients from the store cupboard.
Professor McGonagall informs Harry about not worrying, which is mentioned by Slughorn as a reason for Harry's situation.
